Penumbral_Grasp.display_help: Penumbral Grasp deals moderate Negative Energy damage, reduces their chance to hit and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Penumbral_Grasp.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DOT(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Penumbral_Grasp.display_target_help: You have been entangled by Penumbral Grasp and have been left immobilized.

Smite.display_help: You wrap your fists with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a Smite that deals High negative energy damage. Smite clouds the target's vision, lowering its chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Smite.display_target_help: The Smite has reduced your Accuracy.

Death_Shroud.display_help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Death_Shroud.display_target_help: You are taking damage from the Death Shroud.

Shadow_Maul.display_help: You wrap your entire arms with Negative Energy channeled from the Netherworlds, then perform a series of blows that deal a lot of damage over a short period of time to multiple targets in front of you. These blows cloud your target's vision, lowering his chance to hit for a short time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Shadow_Maul.display_target_help: Your chance to hit has been reduced by the Shadow Maul.

Soul_Drain.display_help: Using this power, you can drain the essence of all nearby foes' souls, thus increasing your own strength. Each affected foe will lose some Hit Points and add to your Damage and chance to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Touch_of_Fear.display_help: The Netherworld is one scary place, and with but a touch, you can give your enemy a glimpse into this dark world. This will cause them to helplessly tremble in Fear. Foes in this state of panic have reduced chance to hit. Additionally, drawing upon this connection to the Netherworld causes you to rapidly regenerate health and recover endurance for a short time. Recharge: Moderate
Touch_of_Fear.display_target_help: You are terrified and your chance to hit is reduced.

Dark_Consumption.display_help: The dark power of the Netherworld allows you to tap the essence of your foe's soul and transfer it to yourself. This will drain the Hit Points of your enemy and add to your Endurance. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

Dark_Pit.display_help: Envelops a targeted foe and any nearby enemies in a pit of Negative Energy. The attack deals no damage, but Disorients all affected foes for a good while. Recharge: Slow

Midnight_Grasp.display_help: Mastery over the forces of the Netherworld allows you to create dark tentacles that can Immobilize a foe and continuously drain his life force. Damage: Superior(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Midnight_Grasp.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Negative), Foe Immobilize, -To Hit
Midnight_Grasp.display_target_help: The dark tentacles of the Midnight Grasp are holding you immobile. Your chance to hit is reduced.

Electric_Fence.display_help: Surrounds and Immobilizes a single target in an Electric Fence. Deals some damage over time and slowly drains some Endurance. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Electric_Fence.display_target_help: You are immobilized by the Electric Fence.

Charged_Brawl.display_help: Your fists become electrically charged and deliver a powerful punch. Charged Brawl can drain some Endurance from the target and may overload their synapses, leaving them writhing for a moment. A portion of drained Endurance may be returned to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release them. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Charged_Brawl.display_target_help: You have been put to sleep by the Charged Brawl attack.

Lightning_Field.display_help: While active, you emit a storm of electricity that constantly damages all nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Lightning_Field.display_target_help: You are taking damage from the Lightning Field.

Havok_Punch.display_help: The Havoc Punch is a slower attack than Charged Brawl, but makes up for it with a greater damage. Havoc Punch can may knock down targets, drain some Endurance from your target, or even overload their synapses, leaving them writhing for a moment. A portion of the drained Endurance may be given back to you. Disturbing an overloaded target will disperse the electrical charge and release them. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Havok_Punch.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash/Energy), Foe Sleep, -End, Knock back
Havok_Punch.display_target_help: You have been put to sleep by the Havok Punch.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Lightning_Clap.display_help: You can channel the raw force of a thunderbolt through you knocking enemies back and potentially disorienting them. This electrical energy also causes you to regenerate health and recover endurance very quickly for a short time. Recharge: Long

Thunder_Strike.display_help: A massive attack. You smash your foes with all the power of a lightning bolt. The pummeled victim takes tremendous damage and may be Disoriented. Any nearby foes may be knocked down and take some damage from the shockwave. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Thunder_Strike.display_short_help: Melee (AoE), High DMG(Smash, Energy), Foe Disorient, Knockback

Power_Sink.display_help: Power Sink leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Long

Shocking_Grasp.display_help: Shocking Grasp causes the target to be overcome with a violent electrical charge. The seized target is left writhing in agony and is unable to defend themselves. Shocking Grasp also drains a significant amount of Endurance from the target and may return a portion of it to you. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Shocking_Grasp.display_target_help: You are being Held by the Shocking Grasp.

Power_Thrust.display_help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends them flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Energy_Punch.display_help: Powerful focused punch that may Disorient your opponent! Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Bone_Smasher.display_help: The Bone Smasher is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to Disorient than Energy Punch. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Conserve_Power.display_help: You can channel a tremendous amount of energy through your body for a short period of time. Doing so will heal some hit points, reduce the endurance cost of your powers and boost your regeneration dramatically for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

Stun.display_help: Stun deals a little bit of damage, but Disorients its target a great deal. This attack can Disorient most opponents. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

Power_Boost.display_help: Greatly boosts the secondary effects of your powers. Your powers effects like Heals, Defense Buffs, Endurance Drains, Disorients, Holds, Immobilizes, Knockbacks and more, are all improved. The effects of Power Boost last a short while, and only the next couple of attacks will be boosted. Recharge: Long

Boost_Range.display_help: You can boost your powers to increase the range of your next few attacks. Recharge: Long

Total_Focus.display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

Ring_of_Fire.display_help: Immobilizes your target in a Ring of Fire. Deals some damage over time. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Medium
Ring_of_Fire.display_target_help: The Ring of Fire is burning you and holding you motionless.

Fire_Sword.display_help: Through concentration, you can create a sword of fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Fire_Sword.display_target_help: The Fire Sword has caught you on fire.

Combustion.display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Combustion.display_target_help: You have spontaneously combusted! You are burning!

Fire_Sword_Circle.display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Fire_Sword_Circle.display_target_help: The Fire Sword has caught you on fire.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Blazing_Aura.display_help: While active, you are surrounded by flames that continuously burn all foes that attempt to enter melee range. In addition, you recover a small amount of health every few seconds. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Very Fast
Blazing_Aura.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DoT(Fire), Self +Heal Over Time, +Recovery
Blazing_Aura.display_target_help: The Blazing Aura is burning you.

Consume.display_help: You can Consume some fuel from your nearby enemies to recover Endurance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long

Burn.display_help: You can ignite the ground beneath you, freeing yourself from Immobilization effects. Foes that enter the flames you leave behind will take damage. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Burn.display_target_help: You are caught in a roaring fire and burning!
Burn.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} the ground underneath you, freeing you from Immobilize effects!

Hot_Feet.display_help: While active, you heat the earth in a large area around yourself. Enemy movement is Slowed as they attempt to flee the immediate area. All foes in the affected area may also suffer some damage over time. You cannot fly and must be near the ground to use this power. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Hot_Feet.display_target_help: The ground below you is incredibly hot. You are burning and your running speed is reduced.

Web_Grenade.display_help: Upon impact, the Toxic Web Grenade expels a strong, tenuous, and very sticky substance that can Immobilize and corrode most targets, dealing moderate Toxic damage. This device does not prevent targets from attacking, although their attack rate is Slowed. The Web can bring down flying entities and halts jumping. Recharge: Fast
Web_Grenade.display_target_help: You have been caught in a web. You cannot move or fly and your attack speed is reduced.

Caltrops.display_help: You toss a handful of Caltrops at a targeted location and spread the tiny metal spikes over a large area. Any villains that pass over the Caltrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Caltrops.display_target_help: The caltrops are causing minor damage to you and slowing your running speed.

Taser.display_help: The High Voltage Taser is an overcharged stun-gun, releasing a high-voltage, high-amperage electrical charge that can Disorient most opponents with major tissue damage. The Taser has a very short range. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Targeting_Drone.display_help: When this device is activated, the small Targeting Drone hovers around your head and emits targeting laser sights. The lasers can dramatically improve your chance to hit, slightly increase the damage you deal, and increase your perception, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. If not engaged in combat, this power will give a large damage buff to your opening attack. Targeting Drone also grants you resistance to powers that debuff your chance to hit. Recharge: Moderate
Targeting_Drone.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +To Hit, +Damage, +Recharge, +Perception, Res(DeBuff To Hit)
Targeting_Drone.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your chance to hit.

Smoke_Grenade.display_help: The Smoke Grenade envelops all those in the affected area in a cloud of smoke. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Smoke_Grenade.display_target_help: Your visual range and chance to hit have been reduced by the Smoke Grenade.
Smoke_Grenade.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} hits {PlayerDest} slightly reducing their chance to hit and dramatically reducing their perception!
Smoke_Grenade.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with a {PowerName} slightly decreasing your chance to hit and dramatically reducing your perception!

Cloaking_Device.display_help: Through a mixture of combat training and highly sophisticated devices you are considered a Field Operative. You use a LCD body coating to become partially invisible. While concealed you can only be seen at very close range. If you attack while concealed, you will be discovered. Even if discovered, you are hard to see but will retain some of your Defense bonus to all attacks. Unlike some stealth powers, Field Operative has no movement penalty. This power's stealth component will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. In addition to being stealthy, your training also allows you to regenerate health and recovery endurance at an accelerated rate while this power is active. However, only half of this regeneration bonus is enhanceable. Recharge: Very Fast
Cloaking_Device.display_attacker_hit: You are now stealthy and recover both health and endurance more quickly.

Trip_Mine.display_help: You can place a Trip Mine on the ground. Any villains that pass near the Trip Mine will cause it to explode, severely damaging all nearby foes and sending them flying. The Trip Mine is almost impossible to detect, but it is fragile and may be set off by an enemy's explosion. Even if destroyed, the Trip Mine will detonate. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Trip_Mine.display_short_help: Place Mine: PBAoE, Superior DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Knockback

Time_Bomb.display_help: You can place a Time Bomb on the ground. The Time Bomb will detonate 5 seconds after being placed, resulting in a massive explosion that can devastate all nearby foes and send them flying. The Time Bomb is small, and almost impossible to detect. However, it is fragile and may be set off by an enemy's explosion. Even if destroyed, the Bomb will still detonate. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Time_Bomb.display_short_help: Place Bomb: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Lethal/Fire), Foe Knockback

Auto_Turret.display_help: You can summon a Gun Drone. The Drone has an extremely fast fire rate and is equipped with a customized tracking system. Once locked on, the Drone will continue to unload a volley of lead into the target until it is destroyed. Enemies hit by the drone, as well as those near it, will prioritize attacking it over it's owner. The Drone is armored, but can be destroyed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Long

Chilblain.display_help: Immobilizes your target in an icy trap. Deals some damage over time and slightly Slows the target's attack and movement speed. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Chilblain.display_target_help: You have been frozen in place. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced and you are freezing.

Frozen_Fists.display_help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice, giving them the ability to quickly inflict moderate damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is Slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Moderate Recharge: Fast
Frozen_Fists.display_target_help: You have been chilled by the Frozen Fists. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Ice_Sword.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals higher damage then Frozen Fists. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Sword.display_target_help: You have been chilled by the Ice Sword. Your Attack speed and Running speed are reduced.

Chilling_Embrace.display_help: While active, you dramatically lower the temperature around yourself, Slowing the attack rate of all nearby foes, as well as their movement speed and damage. The air around your body becomes so cold that attacks deflect off of it, granting you absorption, while your body becomes extremely energy efficient, granting you bonus Recovery. Recharge: Very Fast
Chilling_Embrace.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Foe -Recharge, -Speed, -DMG, Self +Absorb over Time, +Recovery
Chilling_Embrace.display_target_help: Your Attack speed, Running speed and damage are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Ice_Patch.display_help: You emanate a patch of ice around you, which causes foes that step onto it to slip and fall down. This effect lasts until the ice melts. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Recharge: Slow

Shiver.display_help: You can blast forth a wide cone of chilling air that dramatically Slows the movement and attack rate of nearby foes. Recharge: Slow
Shiver.display_target_help: You are shivering. Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced.

Freezing_Touch.display_help: This Freezing Touch will encase a single foe in a block of ice. This will deal minor damage as well as freezing them in their tracks, leaving them cold and helpless. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow
Freezing_Touch.display_target_help: You are frozen solid by the Freezing Touch.

Frozen_Aura.display_help: Your mastery of cold enables you to dramatically lower the temperature immediately around you. Foes near you when you perform a Frozen Aura will be caught in a fragile casing of ice. Frozen foes will break free if attacked. Frozen Aura deals no significant damage. Recharge: Slow
Frozen_Aura.display_target_help: You are hibernating in the Frozen Aura.

Ki_Push.display_help: You smash your foe with a burst of Ki Energy, sending them flying through the air in slow motion. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Ki_Push.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Repel, KB
Ki_Push.display_target_help: You have been smashed with a Ki Push and are being repelled.
Ki_Push.display_target_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Repel, KB

Storm_Kick.display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage, knocking them down. Storm Kick has an additional chance to cause your target to bleed for Lethal damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium
Storm_Kick.display_short_help: Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), DoT(Lethal), Foe Knockdown

Reach_for_the_Limit.display_help: You are constantly looking for vulnerabilities in your foes' stances and positioning. Whenever you attack, you have a chance to gain a moderate +ToHit and +Damage bonus for a short duration.

Build_Up_Proc.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit.
Build_Up_Proc.display_target_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit.

Burst_of_Speed.display_help: Channeling physical Ki inwards, you move more quickly than can be seen for an instant, allowing you to move instantly to a targeted location and strike at targets within melee range. You can use this Burst of Speed up to 3 times before it needs to recharge.
Burst_of_Speed.display_short_help: Location AoE Moderate DMG (Smash), Self Teleport

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals moderate damage, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits may trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown

Reaction_Time.display_help: You attune yourself to the world around you, moving with preternatural speed. All enemies nearby move slowly and have reduced recharge, and you can absorb small amounts of damage every 2 seconds. When Reaction Time is deactivated, you gain a burst of speed for a short duration, increasing your own recharge and move speed.
Reaction_Time.display_short_help: Toggle (PBAoE), Self Absorb over Time, +Recovery, Foe Rech, - Move, Special
Reaction_Time.display_target_help: Your Attack speed, Running speed and damage are reduced by the Chilling Embrace.

Inner_Will.display_help: When pushed to your limit, you can tap into an inner reserve of power, allowing you to overcome impossible odds. When you are below half health, below half endurance, or the victim of any status effect, you may activate Inner Will. Inner Will cancels any status effects currently affecting you, increases your resistance to status effects by 100%, and increases the power of your own status effect-inducing powers. Inner Will also heals you for a moderate amount when activated. Recharge: Very Long

Throw_Sand.display_help: You grab some nearby debris and fling it towards a nearby foe, obstructing their vision and dazing them. Recharge: Long
Throw_Sand.display_target_help: You have been blinded. You are stunned and have difficulty seeing.

Eagles_Claw.display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. Eagle's Claw strikes so powerfully that it weakens your target's resolve, reducing their Range and Recharge for several seconds after attacking. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Eagles_Claw.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +Special
Eagles_Claw.display_target_help: You have been Disoriented and Demoralized. Your Range and Recharge have been reduced.

Subdual.display_help: Subdual deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Subdual.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

Mind_Probe.display_help: Grip the minds of your foe with a Mind Probe. You must be in close proximity to pull off this attack that wrecks havoc on your foes synapses, dealing moderate Psionic Damage while reducing their attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Mind_Probe.display_target_help: The Mind Probe has slowed your Attack rate.

Telekinetic_Thrust.display_help: A focused attack of intense mental power that violently sends a nearby foe flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Psychic_Scream.display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

Build_Up.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit. Recharge: Long

Drain_Psyche.display_help: You Drain the Psyche of nearby foes, thus weakening their Hit Point Regeneration and Endurance Recovery and boosting your own. Recharge: Very Long

World_of_Confusion.display_help: This toggle power allows you to cause psionic damage and cause confusion within a group of foes, creating chaos. The chance of confusing an enemy is lower than then chance of damaging them, and it may take multiple hits to affect stronger opponents. All affected foes within the area will turn and attack each other, ignoring all heroes. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by Confused enemies. Recharge: Moderate
World_of_Confusion.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DoT(Psionic), Foe Confuse
World_of_Confusion.display_target_help: You are confused and may attack an incorrect target.

Scare.display_help: You entwine a single foe within their deepest fears and cause them to helplessly tremble for a brief while.

Psychic_Shockwave.display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow
Psychic_Shockwave.display_target_help: The Psychic Wail has reduced your attack rate.

Immobilizing_Dart.display_help: Immobilizing Darts do minor toxic damage over time and weakens your foe's legs. They will either be entirely unable to move, or severely slowed down. Damage: Minor(DoT). Recharge: Fast
Immobilizing_Dart.display_target_help: You have been hit by an Immobilizing Dart. You are either slowed down or entirely immobilized.

Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your Ninja Blade. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Sting_of_the_Wasp.display_target_help: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

Choking_Powder.display_help: Toss a fistful of toxic powder at an enemys face. This powder will temporarily close the affected foes throat making them choke and struggle to grasp for air. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Choking_Powder.display_target_help: The Soot is causing damage to you and preventing you from acting.

Kyokan.display_help: A shinobi is a master of stealth and assassination. While this power is active you will be very hard to detect, and your first strike out of the shadows will deal extra damage. Even If you manage to regain cover, you can only inflict this surprise attack once every 30 seconds. Even while detected, a shinobi is a deadly foe and able to deal slightly higher damage . This power cant be used at the same time as other stealth powers. Recharge: Very Fast
Kyokan.display_short_help: Toggle: Self Self +DEF(Melee, Ranged, AoE), +Run Speed, +Jump

The_Lotus_Drops.display_help: You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
The_Lotus_Drops.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Kuji-In_Toh.display_help: Kuji-In Toh invokes the power of Toh, or harmony with the universe. Focusing your inner power, you can make your body regenerate and recover endurance for a while. You also gain resistance to psionic attacks and fear protection. Recharge: Long

Smoke_Flash.display_help: You throw a smoke bomb at your feet. The resulting flash of light and smoke can briefly distract your foes and Placate them so they can no longer find or target you. Enemies will be distracted and confused, making them more vulnerable to attacks for a short time. Recharge: Long
Smoke_Flash.display_target_help: You have been Placated and your resistance has been lowered.

Blinding_Powder.display_help: You throw a handful of Blinding powder in a wide arc at your foes. Most foes will be blinded, and unable to see. Some affected targets may be overcome by the powder that they may start attacking their own allies. If you attack the blinded foes, they will be alerted to your presence, but will continue to suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Long
Blinding_Powder.display_target_help: Your have been blinded. You are helpless and confused.

Golden_Dragonfly.display_help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Golden_Dragonfly.display_target_help: The Katana has reduced your Defenses.

Entangle.display_help: Immobilizes your target by Entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny roots. The roots do smashing and lethal damage to the target over time. More resilient foes may require multiple applications to Immobilize. Entangle can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Entangle.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize
Entangle.display_target_help: The roots have Entangled you, crushing and cutting you. You are immobile and cannot fly.

Skewer.display_help: You lunge forward with this melee attack and Skewer your foe with the large Thorn on your arm. Deals high damage and poisons your foe. Poison from the Thorns deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Fast
Skewer.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Strangler.display_help: Holds a distant foe by Strangling him with massive root-like vines. The target is held helpless, while he is slowly crushed by the vines. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Strangler.display_target_help: The Strangler Vine is crushing you and preventing you from acting.

Toxins.display_help: You use your power over plants to coat all your attacks with powerful toxins for a few seconds, all your attacks will now do extra toxic damage and be more accurate. Recharge: Long
Toxins.display_attacker_hit: You activate {PowerName} and increase the power of your next few attacks.

Thorn_Burst.display_help: You can explode dozens of Thorns in all directions around you. These Thorns only travel a short distance, but they can deal moderate damage and poison any target close to you. Toxic damage from the thorns can reduce the Defense of affected foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Thorn_Burst.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Wild_Fortress.display_help: You encase yourself and in a protective barrier that will absorb a moderate amount of damage. Additionally, you will recover endurance faster and be resistance to toxic damage and confuse protection. Recharge: Slow

Ripper.display_help: You can unleash a spectacular slashing maneuver that attacks all foes in a wide arc directly in front of you. Ripper deals massive damage and poisons multiple targets. It can even knock foes down. Thorn poison deals additional Toxic damage and can reduce your foes Defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
Ripper.display_target_help: You are poisoned! You are taking Toxic Damage and your Defense is Reduced.

Vines.display_help: Creates a field of Strangler Vines that can Hold multiple foes at range. The affected targets are held helpless by the massive root-like vines. Unlike the power Strangler, this power does not deal any damage, but it can Hold multiple foes at once. Recharge: Very Long
Vines.display_target_help: The Vines are Holding you and preventing you from acting.
Vines.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} lash out at {PlayerDest} and hold them!

Spore_Cloud.display_help: You create a large cloud of toxic spores around your targeted foe. The target and all nearby foes will have their damage output, chance to hit and regeneration rate reduced. Recharge: Long
Spore_Cloud.display_target_help: The Spore Cloud is reducing your damage, chance to hit and regeneration rate!
Spore_Cloud.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} weakens {PlayerDest} and all nearby foes.
Spore_Cloud.display_victim_hit: You have been weakened by a {PowerName} from {PlayerSource}, decreasing your chance to hit, damage and regeneration.

Electron_Shackles.display_help: Immobilizes a single target and deals some energy damage over time. Some more resilient foes may require multiple attacks to Immobilize. Electron Shackles can also reduce a target's Defense and will surround it in negatively charged particles. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Electron_Shackles.display_target_help: You are immobilized by the Electric Fence.

Negatron_Slam.display_help: You channel a greater amount of radiation into your fists and deliver a hard-hitting blow that deals Moderate Energy and Smashing damage to the target as well as reduce their Defense for a short time. The affected target will also be surrounded in negatively charged particles. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Negatron_Slam.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe -Def, Knockdown, Special
Negatron_Slam.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Radioactive Smash!

Positron_Cell.display_help: Encases a single target in a cage made of positrons. The radiation emitted slowly hurts the victim, inflicting energy damage over time. The encased victim is held helpless and unable to defend themselves in addition to being surrounded by positively charged particles. Damage, Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Positron_Cell.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Energy), Foe Hold, -To Hit
Positron_Cell.display_target_help: The Penumbral Grasp has stopped you in your tracks!

Ionize.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your chance to hit.

Beta_Decay.display_help: While Beta Decay is active, nearby foes will have their chance to hit and defense decreased slightly. You will gain a recharge bonus per nearby target up to 10 targets. The first target grants the largest benefit. Recharge: Moderate

Metabolic_Acceleration.display_help: You cloak yourself in a field of radiation that increases your running speed, attack speed, Endurance recovery and Regeneration rate. However, only half of this regeneration bonus is enhanceable. Your metabolism is increased so much that you become resistant to effects such as Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Immobilization and Endurance Drain. Recharge: Moderate
Metabolic_Acceleration.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Recharge, +Special, +Regeneration, +Recovery, +Res(Hold, Stun, Sleep, Immobilize, End)
Metabolic_Acceleration.display_attacker_hit: You are now more accurate and recover both health and endurance more quickly.

Atom_Smasher.display_help: You charge up a dangerously unstable amount of radioactive energy into a single fist before driving it into the ground and causing a small explosion. Foes caught in the blast will suffer High Energy and Toxic damage and have their defense reduced. Damage: High, Recharge: Long
Atom_Smasher.display_short_help: PBAoE, High DMG(Energy/Toxic), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special
Atom_Smasher.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by Atom Smasher!

Radioactive_Cloud.display_help: When activated, you generate toxic radioactive gas around yourself. Any nearby foes may be overcome by the gas, leaving them choking and helpless. Recharge: Long
Radioactive_Cloud.display_target_help: You are caught in a Choking Cloud.

Positronic_Fist.display_help: You hammer your foe with a brutal smashing attack charged with a lethal dose of radiation. Your target will suffer Extreme Energy and Smashing damage, will have its defense reduced and will be disoriented for a short time in addition to being surrounded by positively charged particles.
Positronic_Fist.display_short_help: Melee, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe -Def, Disorient, Special

Electrified_Net_Arrow.display_help: Upon impact, the Electrified Net Arrow releases an electrically charged net that can Immobilize most targets. This device deals electric damage over time but and does not prevent targets from attacking. The Electrified Net Arrow can bring down flying entities, halts jumping and slows all of their actions. Electrified Net Arrow has a fairly low Endurance cost and a bonus to its Accuracy. Recharge: Fast
Electrified_Net_Arrow.display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DOT(Energy), Target Immobilize, -Fly, Slow
Electrified_Net_Arrow.display_target_help: You have been caught in a net. You cannot move or fly and your actions are slowed.

Glue_Arrow.display_help: This arrow carries a cartridge of intensely sticky glue, which explodes on impact. The glue slows the movement and attack rates of any foes in the area. Recharge: Very Slow

Ice_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can freeze a single foe in a block of ice. The target is frozen solid, helpless, and can be attacked. More powerful foes may not be Held, but all affected targets will be Slowed. Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Arrow.display_target_help: You are frozen in a Block of Ice. Once free, your Attack Rate and Running speed will be reduced slightly for a while.

Upshot.display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases chance to hit and recharge time of all your powers for 10 seconds. Recharge: Long

Flash_Arrow.display_help: This arrow explodes in a dazzling flash of light and sound. The targets are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to their chance to hit. Recharge: Slow
Flash_Arrow.display_target_help: The flash of light has left you dazzled. Your chance to hit and range of sight are greatly diminished.

Eagle_Eye.display_help: You have developed an incredible eyesight. Your accuracy is dramatically improved and your perception increased allowing you to better see distant and stealthy foes. You have also become resistant to powers that debuff your accuracy or chance to hit. In addition to being more accurate, your training also allows you to regenerate health and recovery endurance at an accelerated rate while this power is active. However, only half of this regeneration bonus is enhanceable. Recharge: Slow
Eagle_Eye.display_attacker_hit: You are now more accurate and recover both health and endurance more quickly.

Quickness.display_help: Years of training have made you extremely agile and quick on your feet. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Quickness.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

EMP_Arrow.display_help: This arrow can unleash a massive electrostatic discharge on impact. This ESD can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage. Recharge: Very Long
EMP_Arrow.display_short_help: AoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots
EMP_Arrow.display_target_help: You are held immobile by the Electrostatic Discharge.

Gymnastics.display_help: While active, Gymnastics increases your Defense to all attacks, protects you against Knockback and adds resistance to Immobilization, Stuns and Holds. Moderately increases your jump height and distance while providing good air control.
Gymnastics.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you harder to hit.

Time_Wall.display_help: You're create time barrier to immobilize a single enemy. Enemies behind this barrier will have time slow down around them reducing their attack rate. Enemies that are strong enough to cross the barrier will still have their movement speed reduced. Time is slowed to such an extreme that their wounds will take longer to heal, reducing their regeneration rate. Time Wall applies the Delayed effect on its target. Damage, debuff and control effects from other Time Manipulation powers are increased on targets affected by Delayed. Recharge: Long.
Time_Wall.display_target_help: Your attack rate, movement speed and regeneration rate have been reduced

Aging_Touch.display_help: You touch an enemy and accelerate their aging process causing exhaustion and psionic damage. Affected enemies will continue to age for a limited time, and suffering psionic damage over time. Targets affected by the Delayed effect will suffer from a more psionic damage over time. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Time_Stop.display_help: You trap your target within the flow of time causing them to be held helpless. Even those resistant to the effects of Time Stop's hold will still have their regeneration rate and healing effects reduced for a brief period. Targets affected by the Delayed effect will suffer from a more powerful hold, however its benefits are brief. Recharge: Long
Time_Stop.display_target_help: You have been held by Time Stop. Your healing effects and regeneration rate have also been reduced.

Chronological_Selection.display_help: You distort time around you, selecting a period of time where your abilities are at your highest. Your damage, attack rate and chance to hit are dramatically increased for a brief period. This power places the Accelerated effect on you. While this is in effect, the target has any healing and healing over time effects from Temporal Healing or Lord of Time significantly increased. Recharge: Very Long
Chronological_Selection.display_target_help: Your movements have been sped up as if you're flowing more quickly through time. You gain a significant bonus to your damage, recharge rate and chance to hit.
Chronological_Selection.display_attacker_hit: Your movements have been sped up as if you're flowing more quickly through time. You gain a significant bonus to your damage, recharge rate and chance to hit.

End_of_Time.display_help: You open a gate in time that can suck in enemies and send them into a distant unknown future. The affected enemies will be quickly returned to the present time, but not before being temporarily exposed to radiation and the bitter cold of an empty void. Targets affected by the Delayed effect will suffer bonus damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Long

Temporal_Healing.display_help: You mend your wounds by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured. Temporal Mending will immediately absorb damage as it's inflicted. Additionally, you will gain some resistance to slow effects and regeneration debuffs. If you are affected by the Accelerated effect, you absorb even more damage from this power. Recharge: Low

Future_Pain.display_help: You lay your hands on your foe dig into his future timeline for the most painful experience the foe will ever go through and plant those memories on his present mind inflicting great psionic damage. The visions of this pain may be enough to make your foe cower in fear. Targets affected by the Delayed effect will suffer a more terrifying experience. Recharge: Slow
Future_Pain.display_target_help: The experience of pain from the future has terrified you.

Time_Shift.display_help: You shift time on an area, replacing your foes with future or past versions of themselves. This shift can be very disorienting and will incapacitate affected foes. Stronger foes may be able to resist the effect, but they still will have their movement speed and accuracy reduced. Targets affected by the Delayed effect will suffer from a more powerful disorientation, however its benefits are brief. Recharge: Very Long
Time_Shift.display_target_help: You have been disoriented by future visions of pain.

Time_Lord.display_help: You are a time lord, for you time is just a small hurdle that can easily be overcome or ignored. As a time lord, all your attacks recharge faster and you are resistant to energy attacks in addition to disorient effects, movement debuffs and recharge debuffs. If you are affected by the Accelerated effect, your powers will recharge even faster and you will become nearly immune to recharge debuffs. This power is always on and cost no endurance.
Time_Lord.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.
